name: Gachi Finder 3000
description:
Gachi Finder 3000 is a game about deep dark fantasies of finding characters from Gachimuchi. The amazing journey in which you find your favorite Gachimuchi characters will leave you in a state of euphoria. Its simple, just select a level and find the Gachimuchi character displayed at the top of the screen, once you find it, the level gets harder and harder.
How deep can you make it in Gachi Finder 3000?

Features:
  • Find your favorite Gachimuchi characters
  • 3 Difficulty's of levels
  • Unbearably fun gaymeplay
  • Powerful soundtrack, from the best cumposers
  • Achievements to flex on your friends
  • Only takes one hand to play, which means you can use your other hand for something else.
